data.eml:eml: Sawflies of the genus Emphytopsis (Hymenoptera, Tenthredinidae) associated with Stewartia (Theaceae) in Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shinohara, Akihiko, Saito, Takeshi, Ibuki, Shin-Ichi, Hara, Hideho (2014): Sawflies of the genus Emphytopsis (Hymenoptera, Tenthredinidae) associated with Stewartia (Theaceae) in Japan. Zootaxa 3884 (4): 301-318, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3884.4.1
